title: HackSC
subtitle: Technology Director
description: Led engineering team at USC’s largest hackathon

Built HackSC’s developer and applicant hackathon portal as a open source project. Backend in Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, connected to frontend Angular components. Complete automated mass mailer, application reviewer, and submissions scoring system to handle thousands of users.
Event space management and transportation coordination between universities.

title: Trogons A Cappella
subtitle: Logistics Director
description: East Asian A Cappella performances for campus concerts and events.
Schedule events, manage finances, and design promotional material.

title: Echo
subtitle: Stanford Treehacks 2019 Winner
description: A fully anonymous and decentralized support platform to connect and enable sexual harassment survivors to take action.
Built with Node.js on top of the Blockchain network, written and rendered with React.

title: Roadtrip
subtitle: Capstone Project
description: An Electron desktop application project that allows users to create and share traveling itineraries in Google Maps.
Built backend Java server with authentication, concurrent sync and storage in MongoDB.

title: Bot Builder
subtitle: Personal Project
description: Chatbot creation platform. Users can build, save, and deploy their own chatbot using an online system.
The chatbot, stored and represented as a directed graph, can store an endless number of pathways that can be explored through natural language processing and/or option buttons.

title: Fusor
subtitle: Personal Project
description: The Farnsworth–Hirsch fusor here uses electrostatic containment to attain nuclear fusion in a relatively small machine.
